name: Let's Leave
description:
As the leader of a space colony, your main goal is to ensure the safety of your colonists. Now, the only way to do that is to leave. In 10 days an asteroid will hit the planet, wiping out the colony. To prevent mass panic, colony higher-ups have ensured the public that the meteor is not a threat and diverted their attention to a fake festival on the day of impact. The festival is the perfect distraction to hide what you are really diverting colony resources to... a rocket ship. Manage your resources, feed your citizens, build a ship, and escape LETS LEAVE. How many colonists will be on your ship?

Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2022.
